title: US Crude Oil, Product Inventories Build Across the Board
summary: The American Petroleum Institute (API) estimated that crude oil inventories in the United States rose by 1.25 million barrels in the week ending August 29. title: Nasdaq to invest $50 million in Winklevoss-founded crypto exchange Gemini
summary: Gemini, the crypto exchange founded by Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss, has secured Nasdaq as a strategic investor ahead of its initial public offering this week.

title: OPEC+ Latest Hike Casts Shadow over Glut Narrative
summary: Last Sunday, OPEC+ agreed to add 137,000 bpd to its collective oil output. This was the seventh monthly output hike decision by the group, and it came amid warnings of a looming supply overhang. Yet oil prices rose on the news. While counterintuitive at first glance, the market’s reaction actually …

title: Ranking the Countries Driving the Ocean Plastic Crisis
summary: In the past decade, plastic pollution has become one of the most visible environmental issues worldwide. title: Refinery States Seek to Bar Trump from Shifting Biofuel Mandates
summary: U.S. Senators from states hosting refineries will seek to prevent the Trump Administration from reallocating biofuel blending mandates from exempted small refiners to larger ones, Reuters reported on Tuesday, citing a bill led and co-sponsored by several Republican lawmakers.
